name: Knight of the Reliquary
text: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard.\n{T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Caravan Escort
text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
2/2
LEVEL 5+
5/5
First strike

name: Lionheart Maverick
text: Vigilance\n{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

name: Knight of Cliffhaven
text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
2/3
Flying
LEVEL 4+
4/4
Flying, vigilance

name: Knight of Meadowgrain
text: First strike\nLifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

name: Knight of the White Orchid
text: First strike\nWhen Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
flavor: Both guide and guard on open plain.

name: Leonin Skyhunter
text: Flying
flavor: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

name: Silver Knight
text: First strike, protection from red
flavor: "Hammer out your doubts as you forge your weapon. To slay a dragon, your resolve must be stronger than your steel."

name: White Knight
text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nProtection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
flavor: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

name: Knotvine Paladin
text: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.
flavor: "He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours."\n—Mayael the Anima

name: Steward of Valeron
text: Vigilance\n{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: Knight-stewards guard the Sun-Dappled Court, a grove of immense, sculptured olive trees that represent Valeron's twelve noble families.

name: Benalish Lancer
text: Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)\nIf Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

name: Zhalfirin Commander
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Knight Exemplar
text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nOther Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
flavor: "If you think you are brave enough to walk the path of honor, follow me into the dragon's den."

name: Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
text: Vigilance
flavor: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

name: Kabira Vindicator
text:
Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 2-4
3/6
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
LEVEL 5+
4/8
Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
text: Knight creatures you control have double strike.
flavor: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

name: Alaborn Cavalier
text: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
flavor: "Course he ran! I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"\n—Alaborn soldier

name: Skyhunter Patrol
text: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor: "We leonin have come to rule the plains by taking to the skies."\n—Raksha Golden Cub

name: Plover Knights
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

name: Juniper Order Ranger
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.
flavor: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

name: Paladin of Prahv
text: Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life.\nForecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

name: Harm's Way
text: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.
flavor: Even when fate is already written, there's always time to change the names.

name: Reciprocate
text: Exile target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
flavor: "Just as the noble soul calls virtue to itself, the evil soul summons harm."\n—Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

name: Edge of Autumn
text: If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.\nCycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

name: Mighty Leap
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."\n—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Reprisal
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "Fear this no more!"

name: Test of Faith
text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

name: Heroes' Reunion
text: Target player gains 7 life.
flavor: "You helped save my people from a Phyrexian fate. Did you think I wouldn't return the favor?"\n—Eladamri, to Gerrard

name: Sigil Blessing
text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: "For unwavering commitment and unflinching strength, the Order of the White Orchid confers its sigil. Rise, knight-captain, and do your duty."

name: Loxodon Warhammer
text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink.\nEquip {3}
flavor: "Tusks to splinter skulls. Steel to shatter scale."\n—Warhammer inscription

name: Spidersilk Armor
text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

name: Griffin Guide
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.\nWhen enchanted creature dies, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Oblivion Ring
text: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.\nWhen Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Grasslands
text: Grasslands enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Sacrifice Grasslands: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Sejiri Steppe
text: Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.\n{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

name: Selesnya Sanctuary
text: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.\n{T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

name: Treetop Village
text: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\n{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

name: Bogardan Hellkite
text: Flash\nFlying\nWhen Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

name: Cinder Wall
text: Defender\nWhen Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor: "The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."\n—Onean sergeant

name: Skirk Prospector
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
flavor: "I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."\n—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Bloodmark Mentor
text: Red creatures you control have first strike.
flavor: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

name: Fire-Belly Changeling
text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)\n{R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
flavor: "My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."\n—Auntie Wort

name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

name: Dragon Whelp
text: Flying\n{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Henge Guardian
text: {2}: Henge Guardian gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: Like so many Thran relics, the wurm engine kept operating long after its creators were gone.

name: Voracious Dragon
text: Flying\nDevour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)\nWhen Voracious Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

name: Bogardan Rager
text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

name: Mordant Dragon
text: Flying\n{1}{R}: Mordant Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\nWhenever Mordant Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal that much damage to target creature that player controls.

name: Kilnmouth Dragon
text: Amplify 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it for each Dragon card you reveal in your hand.)\nFlying\n{T}: Kilnmouth Dragon deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target creature or player.

name: Shivan Hellkite
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\n{1}{R}: Shivan Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: A dragon's scale can be carved into a mighty shield, provided you can procure a dragontooth to cut it.

name: Thunder Dragon
text: Flying\nWhen Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: Sometimes primitive cultures attributed natural phenomena to monsters. Sometimes they were right.

name: Armillary Sphere
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

name: Dragon's Claw
text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

name: Breath of Darigaaz
text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)\nBreath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If Breath of Darigaaz was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

name: Dragon Fodder
text: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

name: Punishing Fire
text: Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.\nWhenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Spitting Earth
text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor: "Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."\n—Kumano, to his pupils

name: Captive Flame
text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

name: Ghostfire
text: Ghostfire is colorless.\nGhostfire deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

name: Seething Song
text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
flavor: If your flesh can withstand the flame, the spirit of the dragon will burn within your soul.

name: Seismic Strike
text: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor: "Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."\n—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

name: Claws of Valakut
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
flavor: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

name: Temporary Insanity
text: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Shiv's Embrace
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.\n{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Cone of Flame
text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

name: Fiery Fall
text: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.\nBasic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
flavor: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

name: Jaws of Stone
text: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.
flavor: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.
